document.full_text: - mosaid technologies inc filed a suit against several technology companies, including intel inc, dell inc and research in motion, for what it called patents violations of its wi-fi technology.
document.title: mosaid technologies sues tech companies over wi-fi patents
lines_and_colors: - mosaid technologies inc filed a suit against several technology companies, including intel inc, dell inc and research in motion, for what it called patents violations of its wi-fi technology.
